concept.title: Search For Test Cases With Multiple Tags

conbody.p: After you successfully install the Test Case Management With Tags plugin, in a Dynamic Querying Test Suite, you can search for test cases with multiple tags using the Query Provider.
To search for test artifacts labeled with multiple tags, do as follows:

ol.li: Open a dynamic test suite. See also: Dynamic Test Suite (Dynamic Test Cases List).

li.p: Directly type in the Query box following this syntax: tag=(NameOfTag1,NameOfTag2). For example: tag=(may,december).
